text: Pixote: a Lei do Mais Franco (, lit. "Pixote (small child): The Law of the Weakest") is a 1981 Brazilian drama movie directed by Héctor Babenco and based on the novel A Infância dos Mortos (The Childhood of the Dead Ones) by José Louzeiro. It stars Fernando Ramos de Silva as the title character. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 crime drama movies Category:1980s LGBT movies Category:1980s prison movies Category:Brazilian LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Héctor Babenco Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about social realism
title: Pixote
